briefdescription.para: Draws or prints information about blobs.

parameterdescription.para: If mode CV_BLOB_RENDER_COLOR is used. 1.0 indicates opaque and 0.0 translucent (1.0 by default).

briefdescription.para: Calculates angle orientation of a blob.

Save the image of a blob to a file. The function uses an image (that can be the original pre-processed image or a processed one, or even the result of cvRenderBlobs, for example) and a blob structure. Then the function saves a copy of the part of the image where the blob is.
Draw a contour.
Convert a chain code contour to a polygon.
Draw a polygon.
Calculates area of a polygonal contour.
Calculates perimeter of a chain code contour.
Calculates perimeter of a polygonal contour.
Calculates the circularity of a polygon (compactness measure).

simplesect.para: Circularity: a non-negative value, where 0 correspond with a circumference.

briefdescription.para: Simplify a polygon reducing the number of vertex according the distance "delta". Uses a version of the Ramer-Douglas-Peucker algorithm (http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ramer-Douglas-Peucker_algorithm).

simplesect.para: A simplify version of the original polygon.

briefdescription.para: Calculates convex hull of a contour. Uses the Melkman Algorithm. Code based on the version in http://w3.impa.br/~rdcastan/Cgeometry/.
Write a contour to a CSV (Comma-separated values) file.

briefdescription.para: Write a contour to a SVG file (http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Scalable_Vector_Graphics).
Label the connected parts of a binary image. Algorithm based on paper "A linear-time component-labeling algorithm using contour tracing technique" of Fu Chang, Chun-Jen Chen and Chi-Jen Lu.

parameterdescription.para: Input binary image (depth=IPL_DEPTH_8U and num. channels=1).

simplesect.para: Number of pixels that has been labeled.

(http://www.research.ibm.com/peoplevision/PETS2001.pdf)

parameterdescription.para: Max distance to determine when a track and a blob match.
Max number of frames a track can be inactive.
